item.description:
Thanks to all who attended a great October meetup! The group discussion format worked well and I think we all were given a lot of things to think about.

Special thanks to Amy Graver of Elements for hosting and for so graciously agreeing to host again next month. And also thanks to Liz for making the group logo - check it out!

November's Meetup will again be at the offices of Elements LLC (www.elementsdesign.com). Amy Graver will lead a group discussion on Self Promotion. The group is encouraged to bring samples of past self-promotion pieces - those that worked, those in the works, and for those who are brave enough, those that failed miserably!

Due to requests we will start later - mingling, food, drinks from 6-6:45, group discussion from 6:45-7:30, post-mingling from 7:30-8:00.

Pizza will be served and drinks (soda and wine/beer) provided. A $10 donation ($5 for students) is suggested for helping offset the costs of having the group ($20/month) plus the food.

Wednesday, November 1
6.00pm - 8.00pm

Elements LLC
King's Block
20 Grand Avenue
New Haven, CT 06513
(Corner of Grand and Front along Quinnipiac River)

There is parking on-site accessible from Front Street.

I will be there and I hope that you can all make it too! Please RSVP so we can know how much food/drink to have.

David

ps - Please use the message board to post resources you have found helpful - organizations to join, books, journals, etc.
item.name: Greater New Haven Design November Meetup
